MIT.title: How to get into MIT with perfect grades?
MIT.content: Even with 4.0 GPA, 1600 SAT, and 36 ACT, MIT acceptance rate is only 4.1%. You need exceptional research, leadership, and unique achievements.
advice: Unique projects matter more than perfect grades

MIT.title: MIT admission requirements 2023
MIT.content: MIT looks for students who will change the world. Perfect test scores are just the baseline. You need to show innovation and impact.

Harvard.title: What GPA do you need for Harvard?
Harvard.content: Harvard acceptance rate is 4.0%. Even with 4.0 GPA and perfect test scores, you need exceptional leadership and community impact.

Stanford.title: Stanford admission tips
Stanford.content: Stanford acceptance rate is 4.0%. They want students who will make a difference. Perfect academics are expected, not exceptional.
